SEO_DESCRIPTION: Hire me as a software developer. I'm specialized in web application development.

HOME.BASED_IN: Based in Sant Cugat del Vallés, Spain

ROCHE.TITLE: Software developer - Roche Diagnostics
ROCHE.DESCRIPTION: Collaborating within a team that operates under the SAFe framework and using React, I have contributed to the development of a software application aimed at monitoring and tracking cervical cancer in different countries, striving to make it a thing of the past.

APP2U.TITLE: Apprenticeship - App2u
APP2U.DESCRIPTION: At app2u, I had the opportunity to gain my first hands-on experience in the world of work, where I embarked on my journey of training in Angular.
